hero.title: I'm José, a Frontend Developer from Lima, Peru.
hero.description:
I am 22 years old, a self-taught software developer with a great passion for coding,
quick to learn, optimistic, hard-working, and easy to adapt.
hero.knowMore: You can read more about me

workTogether.title: What are you working on?
workTogether.description:
If you want to work with me, just send me an email
electronic and I'll be ready to make it happen.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description:
I am a Frontend Web Developer with more than 4 years of experience. I am passionate about
quality codes, best practices, safety and performance.
aboutMe.description1:
I work on complex frontend projects with new languages and technologies, and also have a decent understanding of server-side development. While I enjoy experimenting with
new frameworks and libraries, I understand the importance of focusing attention on the final
goal: to deliver a beautiful and functional product to the user/customer.
aboutMe.description2:
I see every new experience as an opportunity to learn. My favorite projects are
those that require me to go beyond my limits and acquire new skills and
knowledge to be successful.
